post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Hello Brad. We are currently recruiting for a permanent senior Java/J2EE developer with Struts, Eclipse and Web based experience. This position is for an established company in the Scarborough area. If you know of anyone who might be interested please have them contact me. Thanks Brad
Best regards, Valerie Anderson Career Specialist, Technology Modis International (416) 492 5656 ext. 286 valerie.anderson@modisit.com www.modisit.com Modis Delivers
post.title: A permanent senior Java/J2EE developer
